message: Let's start with a straightforward offer. Accept and we can be done!
Let's be fair. I'll take 90, you take 10. It's a good deal for both of us, and we can move on.
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to give away too much. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 20.  Let's split it 70/30, and get this done.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the majority. This is my final offer!
Time is running out. Let's split it 60/40. It's a fair compromise, and we both get something.
I'm not getting any younger, but I'm not getting any poorer either. Take it or leave it!
We're both losing out with every round. Let's split it 50/50 and end this before we get nothing at all.
